name: tm51
effect: Teaches Roost to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ally Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Roost)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its top HP.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user teleports using a strange
power and switches its place with one of
its allies.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user teleports using a strange
power and switches its place with one of
its allies.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The target is hit with wings of steel.
This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to
five times in a row.
